China PCB One
Happy Birthday
29th.Oct.2008
It is a ordinary day, it is the date that our dreams start to beginning. Chinapcbone was established on this day, we are starting to focus on PCB manufacturing & assembly. For 4015 days, we joined hands and worked side by side, all the way, from a team of several people to a family of hundreds of people, from no order to full sales, we have never given up the original dream, and we are keeping struggling. In the past 11 years, we have appreciated the trust of every customer. It is your trust that allows us to go better and better. 11 years ,along the way ,we are grateful for you . In the past 11 years, we are grateful to every colleague, thank you all of your hard work and effort.
